page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I wake up and get dressed and I go out to feed the ducklings and get water for the sheep and I help in the milking parlour and then I have some tea and then I go in for breakfast and then I come to school by taxi and then we go to the hall and when we come out we do a drawing and then we do maps and then we go for dinner and then we go swimming and then I go home by taxi again and I play outside and I come in for my tea and go to bed about half past seven and stay up playing in my bedroom until about nine o'clock.
